text: Volodymyr Demydovych Lobas (; born 6 March 1970 in Kiev) is a Ukrainian football coach and a former player. He is managing FC Merani Martvili. He played for the main squad of FC Dynamo Kyiv in the USSR Federation Cup. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Kyiv Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Dynamo Kyiv players Category:FC Ros Bila Tserkva players Category:NK Veres Rivne players Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Dynamo-2 Kyiv players Category:FC Nyva Ternopil players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC CSKA-Borysfen Kyiv players Category:FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi players Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Panserraikos F.C. players Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece Category:Acharnaikos F.C. players Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:Ukrainian expatriate football managers Category:Expatriate football managers in Georgia (country) Category:Association football forwards
title: Volodymyr Lobas
